Note: Signed "Witold Gordon." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in Polish and English says to the Poles that under their Polish flag they should fight for "our liberty and yours." Enlist to-day. Illustration shows a Polish man in uniform carrying a Polish and an American flag together.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Place of publication not identified : publisher not identified

Title: Polacy!
